src_original: krodha rājagaṇauścānyairhaya (239)  grīvādibhirdvataṣṭha ||  sarvasatvahitoyukto bhagavānavalokitaḥ || 6 ||  vijahāratataḥ śrīmānpadmagarbhāsane sthiḥ ||  mahātāta pasāyukto maitryā ca kṛpayānvitaḥ || 7 ||
tgt_original: 吉祥蓮華座　　安詳而端坐

src_original: dharmmaṁdi deśatasyā samahatyāndevaṣarṣadi ||
tgt_original: 與人天大眾　　而為說妙法

src_original: tatro paviṣṭha māgampavajapāṇi rmahāvalaṁḥ || 8 ||  parama kṛtapayāyukto papṛchaty valokitaṁ ||
tgt_original: 爾時金剛手　　大力忿怒王 為悲愍他故　　而問觀自在

src_original: taskaroraga siṁhāgni gajaṇyādhrāṁ vusaṁkaṭe || 9 ||  sīdaṁtybhī munesatvā magnāḥ saṁsāra sāgare |
tgt_original: 師子象虎蛇　　水火賊枷鎖

src_original: uvācamadhurāṁvāṇīṁ vajapāṇiṁ prabodhinaṁ || 15 ||
tgt_original: 出美妙言音　　警覺金剛手

src_original: śṛṇagutyaka rājendra amitābhasya tāyinaḥ ||  praṇidhāna vaśotpannā mamājñā lokamātareḥ || 16 ||
tgt_original: 祕密主諦聽　　我從無重壽 誓願之所生　　為諸世間母

src_original: mahākaruṇayo petā jaṭā mukuṭa saṁyutāḥ ||  uditāditya saṁkāśāḥ pūrṇondu vadana prabhāḥ || 17 ||  bhāyasaṁti imāstārāḥ sadevā sura mānaṣāna ||
tgt_original: 手執優鉢華　　放光照此界 人間及天上　　驚動是世界

src_original: kaṁpayanti trayālokānamtā sayana yakṣa rākṣasāna || 18 ||  nilotpala karādaivī rmābhai rmābhai riti kravan ||
tgt_original: 藥叉羅剎等　　告言勿驚怖

src_original: jagat saṁrakṣaṇārthāya hamutpāditā jinaiḥ || 19 ||  kāntāreśamtrasaṁpātaiḥ nānā bhayasamākule ||  smaraṇādeva nāmāni satvārakṣāmpahaṁsadā || 20 ||
tgt_original: 我從佛變化　　為護於世間 種種嶮難怖　　刀兵及飢饉

src_original: tārayiṣyā mpahaṁsatvānnānābhaya mahārṇuvān ||
tgt_original: 輪迴種種怖　　我救有情故

src_original: kṛtāṁjali (241) puhābhūtvāta tasmāda rasādhvasāḥ || ||  jvalaṁtokyaṁtarikṣa sthāhdaṁvacana makravan ||
tgt_original: 世稱為哆囉　　說為佛之子 善哉應尊敬　　言已便合掌 即踊空中住　　身光焰熾盛

src_original: nāmāṣṭhaśatakaṁkṛ hitatpurā kīrtitājinaiḥ || 22 ||
tgt_original: 乃宣此語言　　此一百八名

src_original: daśabhūmī kharainathi bodhisatvairmahardvikeḥ ||
tgt_original: 是先佛所說　　十地自在等 無量諸菩薩　　聞之生歡喜

src_original: sarvapāpaharaṁ puṇya māṁgalya kīrtivarvdanaṁ || 23 ||  dhanadhākaraṁceva ārogya pūṣṭhivarddhanaṁ ||
tgt_original: 若有人受持　　諸罪悉消除 福增名稱廣　　資財多吉祥

src_original: āyurārogya jananaṁ sarva satva sukhāvahaṁ || 24 ||  lakrīśrīsthāpaṁ caiva sarvasatva vivarvdanaṁ ||
tgt_original: 諸病皆殄散　　安祥住福田 長壽乃安樂　　興慈度有情

src_original: eva mukrārtha bhagavāna prahasannavalokitaḥ vyavalokyaṁ diśassarvā maintryāsparaṇayāddaśā || 26 ||  dakṣiṇaṁ karamudṛtya puṇyalakṣaṇamaṇḍitaṁ ||
tgt_original: 彼名大牟尼　　具德如是說 觀自在微笑　　乃觀於十方 變化運慈心　　即申其右手

src_original: namānaśṛṇu mahābhāga sarvasatva kavatsala ||
tgt_original: 善哉金剛手　　今聽大福德 是妙寂靜名　　正直為人說

src_original: thānisaṁkirtya manujāḥ samyakkesya rdhaneśvarāḥ || 28 ||  sarvavyādhi vinirmuktāḥ sarvaiśvaryaguṇā (242) nvitāḥ ||
tgt_original: 若聞得安樂　　豐財兼自在 諸病得解脫　　具足諸功德

src_original: akālamṛtyuni naṣṭhā sukhādyāṁti sukhāvitaṁ || 29 ||
tgt_original: 息除於中夭　　後終生極樂

src_original: ra śatakaṁ kīrtti taṁ hye ladutta (bhta) maṁ || 42 ||  rahasyamadrabhutaṁ guhyaṁ devanāmavidurlabhaṁ ||
tgt_original: 以說此百八　　寂靜祕密名 能利諸有情　　希有祕福田 天上及人間　　亦甚難逢遇

src_original: saubhāgya bhāgya karaṇaṁ sarvakilviṣānāgataṁ || 43 ||  sarvvavyādhipraśamanaṁ sarvasatva sukhāvahaṁ ||  triṣkālaṁyaḥ paṭheddhī mānaśuvi (vi)
tgt_original: 令一切有情　　瞻視得安樂 智者應一心　　澡浴淨其身 三時專念誦　　時彼人不久

src_original: adhano pihikā lena rājaśriyabhavā yāt ||  duḥkhitasya mukhaṁnityaṁdaridrodhana vā na bhavate || 45 ||
tgt_original: 得王所愛敬　　離苦得安樂 貧者獲財寶　　愚得大智慧

src_original: jayo bhave nmahāprājñaḥ medhāvīcana na saṁśayaḥ ||  bandhanānmucyate buddhaḥ vyavahāre ja (kṣa) yo bhaveta || 46 ||
tgt_original: 聰睿不復疑　　枷鎖得解脫

src_original: śatravo mitratāṁyāṁtiśṛṁgiṇaścā thadaṁtinaḥ ||  saṁgrāmesaṁkaṭe durmenā (245)  nā bhaya samākule || 47 ||
tgt_original: 不勝還得勝　　冤返為善友 鋒牙及利角　　鬪諍并嶮難

src_original: smaraśā devanāmāni sarvabhayānya pohati ||
tgt_original: 種種怖畏等　　憶念此名者 能救是諸怖　　止息中天命

src_original: nā kāla mṛtyū bhavati pronyoti vipulaṁ yaśaḥ || 48 ||
tgt_original: 名稱得廣布　　恒生善貴族

src_original: sadīrgha kāla māyuṣmāna śriyaṁca labhate nayaḥ ||  vallabhaḥ sarvasatvānāṁsarvasatva hitaṁ karaḥ || 50 ||
tgt_original: 當獲人稱譽　　壽命得時長
